name: geothermal power plant construction | geothermal power plant, 5.5MWel | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/14072/documentation

This dataset represents the construction of the geothermal power plant at the surface, resulting in a coupled underground and surface system. It collects all parts necessary to build a geothermal power plant: deep well drilling, stimulation, and surface power generation installations. It further includes the implementation of a downhole pump connected with the power generator. ;Detailed information on this dataset is presented in the book "Energy from the Earth. 2015. Hirschberg, Wiemer, Burgherr (eds.) (see field "Data Generator and Publication").

Includes all "components" of a 5.5MWel deep geothermal power plant.

Electricity generation facility, deep geothermal power.
category: F:Construction/42:Civil engineering/422:Construction of utility projects/4220:Construction of utility projects

processDocumentation.geographyDescription: Represents installation of a deep geothermal power plant in Switzerland.

publication.name: S Hirchberg, S Wiemer, P Burgherr2015

flow.category: F:Construction/42:Civil engineering/422:Construction of utility projects/4220:Construction of utility projects
